00256   inline QColor selectPolygonColor(Mode mode){
00257     switch(mode){
00258       case DELETE_NOISE:
00259          return DELETE_NOISE_COLOR;
00260       case DELETE_ARTEFACT:
00261         return DELETE_ARTEFACT_COLOR;
00262       case NEW_CLUSTER:
00263         return NEW_CLUSTER_COLOR;
00264       case NEW_CLUSTERS:
00265         return NEW_CLUSTER_COLOR;
00266       case ZOOM:
00267         break; //nothing to do  
00268       case SELECT_TIME:
00269        break; //nothing to do 
00270    }
00271    //never reach
00272    return QColor(0,0,0);
00273   };

00392   class ComputeEvent : public QCustomEvent{
00393    //Only the method getComputeEvent of ClusterView has access to the private part of ComputeEvent,
00394    //the constructor of ComputeEvent being private, only this method con create a new ComputeEvent
00395    friend ComputeEvent* ClusterView::getComputeEvent(QPointArray selectionPolygon);
00396 
00397   public:
00398     inline ~ComputeEvent(){};
00399     inline QPointArray polygon(){return selectionPolygon;};
00400

00402     ComputeEvent(QPointArray polygon):QCustomEvent(QEvent::User + 700),selectionPolygon(polygon){};

00405   };
